
csl: "shehuixueyanjiu-csl.csl"
output: 
  officedown::rdocx_document:
    reference_docx: temp-shehuixueyanjiu.docx
    plots:
      style: Image Caption
      align: center
      caption:
        style: Image Caption
        pre: '图 '
        sep: '  '
    tables: 
      style: rmdtable
      layout: autofit
      width: 1.0
      caption:
        style: Table Caption
        pre: '表'
        sep: ''
      conditional:
        first_row: true
        first_column: true
        last_row: false
        last_column: false
        no_hband: false
        no_vband: true
